mapper.sql: dpc.dom_pub_cfg_id, dpc.platform_id, dpc.domain_id, dpc.file_name, dpc.ext, dpc.file_size, dpc.md5, dpc.deploy_path, dpc.nexus_repository, dpc.nexus_path, dpc.nexus_asset_id
mapper.insert: insert into domain_public_config(platform_id, domain_id, file_name, ext, file_size, md5, deploy_path, nexus_repository, nexus_path, nexus_asset_id) values (#{platformId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deployPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nexusRepository,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nexusPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nexusAssetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
